ORDERNO.description: Foreign key to ORDERHEADER_TBL.ORDERNO. Links line item to its order.

SKU.description: Foreign key to ITEMMASTER_TBL.SKU. Identifies the item ordered.

RECEIVED.description: Timestamp when the item was received.

PRICEPERUOM.description: Price per unit of measure at time of order.

SALESTAX.description: Calculated sales tax for this line item.

SHIPPING.description: Shipping cost allocated to this item.
